PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01022025-02-14PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 279, British Columbia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 279 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to British Columbia with respect to the interface fires that occurred from April 21 to October 7, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
